title: Get Real with Caroline Hobby Preview: Caroline Bryan (Wife of Luke Bryan)
itunes:title: Get Real with Caroline Hobby Preview: Caroline Bryan (Wife of Luke Bryan)
description:
Caroline Hobby discovered Caroline Bryan’s Instagram page last year and my life was changed forever. The Bryan Family is so much fun and so inspiring. Caroline talks about her love story with Luke and how they met in college. Also how she and Luke have survived tragedy. Luke lost both his siblings and brother-in-law, and took in their 3 children: a son who was in high school and 2 college age daughters to live with them and their 2 sons Bo and Tate. Caroline and Luke also started a charity, Brett’s Barn, with Caroline’s brother and sister-in-law, in honor of her brother’s daughter Brett who died at a very young age.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
